package testcasegeneratortestapplication.de.test;

import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.After;
import org.junit.Before;

import com.iksgmbh.sysnat.testcasejavatemplate.TestCaseTemplateParent;
import com.iksgmbh.sysnat.test.testTemplateContainers.testcasegeneratortestapplication.ComplexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer;
import com.iksgmbh.sysnat.test.domain.Order;

/**
 * Executable Example for TestApplication 'TestCaseGeneratorTestApplication'.
 * Autogenerated by SysNatTesting.
 */
public class ComplexInstructionSequenzTest extends TestCaseTemplateParent
{
	protected ComplexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer;
	
	@Before
	public void setUp() 
	{
		super.setUp();
		complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer = new ComplexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer(this);
	}

	@After
	public void shutdown() 
	{
		if ( ! isSkipped() && executionInfo.isApplicationStarted()) {
			if (languageTemplatesCommon != null) languageTemplatesCommon.gotoStartPage();
		}
		complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer = null;
		super.shutdown();
	}

	@Test
	@Override
	public void executeTestCase() 
	{
		try {
			complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.startNewXX("SequenceTest");
			Order auftrag_1 = complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.createOrder();
			Order auftrag_2 = complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.createOrder();
			complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.addToOrder(auftrag_1, "Wert A");
			complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.addToOrder(auftrag_2, "Wert B");
			Order auftrag_3 = complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.toOrder(auftrag_1, auftrag_2, "C");
			
			closeCurrentTestCaseWithSuccess();
		} catch (Throwable e) {
			super.handleThrowable(e);
		}
	}
}
